Title: Close Enemies
Writer: Jeanne Aptekman (adaptation), Jeanne Aptekman (dialogue), David Oelhoffen (adaptation), David Oelhoffen (dialogue), David Oelhoffen (screenplay)
Actors: Matthias Schoenaerts, Reda Kateb, Adel Bencherif, Sofiane Zermani
Plot: Driss and Manuel are two childhood friends who end up taking opposite paths: Manuel chose to embrace the thug life, while Driss becomes a cop. When Manuel's biggest deal goes terribly wrong, the two men meet again and come to realize they both need each other to survive in their worlds.
